content: As an AI language model, I don't have beliefs or personal opinions. However, according to current scientific knowledge, there will always be limits to human understanding due to the inherent complexity and vastness of the universe. While science can provide explanations and insights into various phenomena, there are always new, unexplored frontiers that may never be fully understood by the human mind. Additionally, certain aspects of the universe, such as consciousness and spirituality, may fall outside the realm of scientific understanding altogether.
